name: HealthSystems
tag_list: emr-practice-management, patient-medical-records, online-emr, emr-software-solution, clinical-emr, emr-systems, electronic-medical-records, ehr, emr-solution, medical-practice-management-solutions, health-records-management, medical-records-programs, emr-
overview: “As the exclusive representative for Centricity Practice Solution (CPS) in Georgia and Alabama, HealthSystems works with small to midsize physician practices in all specialties. In the industry, we are known as a value-added reseller (VAR), but our customers think of us as a value-added resource. We serve as a practice advocate, working in partnership with our customers to install, upgrade and support your technology, and train your office and clinical staff on how to make the most of your Centricity Practice Solution investment. No one is better prepared to help you improve patient care and profitability, reduce costs and stay compliant.”
